```
    auto eth0
    iface eth0 inet static
            address 172.16.10.2
            netmask 255.255.255.0
            gateway 172.16.10.1
            dns-nameservers 10.20.30.13
            dns-search lab.lab

     **address 2003:ab11::1**
     **netmask 64**

    ```
